oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Emergence of Chenopodium album and Stellaria media under different climatic conditions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grundy, A.C.
Peters, N.C.B.
Rasmussen, I.A.
Hartmann, K.A.
Sattin, M.
Andersson, L.

Murdoch, A.J.
Forcella, F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experiments with the germination of two weed species from different origins under different climatic conditions has led to modelling their germination and emergence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: EWRS Bookstore, Postbus 28, NL-6865 ZG Doorwerth, The Netherlands
